title: The 'invincible' winter boot you'll be seeing everywhere this year
text:
Yahoo Lifestyle Canada is committed to finding you the best products at the best prices. We may receive a share from purchases made via links on this page.

When it comes to winter footwear, Australian footwear giant Blundstone are a tried and true favourite.

Made from ultra-durable waterproof premium leather and elastic latexed seams, Blundstones are built to weather the elements while delivering superior comfort.

Image via Blundstone. More

Aside from the stylish Chelsea boot design, each pair of Blundstones feature a rubber sole made with a lightweight, flexible foam called PORON XD to deliver superior cushioning and minimize impact while walking.

ALSO SEE: These are the best classic sweaters for men you can buy

A uniform for urban commuters, Blundstones offer a winterized version of their classic leather lined boot, insulated to keep your feet warm as temperatures drop thanks to synthetic Thinsulate lining. For those looking for even more defence against the elements, they even come with genuine sheepskin insoles for added warmth (additional insoles can be purchased separately).

“I wear these around the city alongside every Torontonian,” one Blundstones shopper wrote. “I swear I feel invincible and have zero cares.”

“I’m loving it,” another added. “Living in the frigid province of Quebec with lots of snow and ice, this boot has been comfortable and warm... warmer than expected.”

ALSO SEE: 'Softest sweater ever' is one of the latest fall must-haves from Nordstrom's sale section

Blundstones may come with a hefty price tag, but according to shoppers, they will quickly become the boots you’ll reach for year after year.

If you’re looking to snap up a pair before the cold weather hits, check out their winterized boots plus other customer favourites below.
